ActivityMetadata.Name: ZM Update Live Stream
ActivityMetadata.Label: ZM Update Live Stream
ActivityMetadata.Description: Zoom allows users to [live stream a meeting](https://support.zoom.us/hc/en-us/articles/115001777826-Live-Streaming-Meetings-or-Webinars-Using-a-Custom-Service) to a custom platform. Use this API to update a meeting's live stream information. **Prerequisites:** * Meeting host must have a Pro license. **Scopes:** `meeting:write:admin` `meeting:write`
ActivityMetadata.HelpHtml:
# Zoom

Update Live Stream

Zoom allows users to [live stream a meeting](https://support.zoom.us/hc/en-us/articles/115001777826-Live-Streaming-Meetings-or-Webinars-Using-a-Custom-Service) to a custom platform. Use this API to update a meeting's live stream information. **Prerequisites:** * Meeting host must have a Pro license. **Scopes:** `meeting:write:admin` `meeting:write`

Method: Patch

OperationID: meetingLiveStreamUpdate

EndPoint:

/meetings/{meetingId}/livestream
